<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match state for an anchor/callsite.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MatchState &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Unknown = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initial match between input profile and current IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InitialMatch = 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initial mismatch between input profile and current IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InitialMismatch = 2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InitialMatch stays matched after fuzzy profile matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnchangedMatch = 3,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InitialMismatch stays mismatched after fuzzy profile matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UnchangedMismatch = 4,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InitialMismatch is recovered after fuzzy profile matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RecoveredMismatch = 5,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InitialMatch is removed and becomes mismatched after fuzzy profile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RemovedMatch = 6,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each function, store every callsite and its matching state into this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// map, of which each entry is a pair of callsite location and MatchState.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be used for sample loader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not clear FlattenedProfiles as it contains function names referenced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by FuncNameToProfNameMap. Clearing this memory could lead to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use-after-free error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    freeContainer(FuncCallsiteMatchStates);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    freeContainer(FunctionsWithoutProfile);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    freeContainer(FuncToProfileNameMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isMismatchState(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MatchState &amp;State) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">           State == MatchState::UnchangedMismatch ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> functionMatchesProfileHelper(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Function &amp;IRFunc,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FunctionId &amp;ProfFunc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine if the function matches profile. If FindMatchedProfileOnly is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set, only search the existing matched function. Otherwise, try matching the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> functionMatchesProfile(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FunctionId &amp;IRFuncName,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FunctionId &amp;ProfileFuncName,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FindMatchedProfileOnly);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine if the function matches profile by computing a similarity ratio</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between two sequences of callsite anchors extracted from function and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile. If it&#39;s above the threshold, the function matches the profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> functionMatchesProfile(Function &amp;IRFunc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FunctionId &amp;ProfFunc,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FindMatchedProfileOnly);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find functions that don&#39;t show in the profile or profile symbol list,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which are supposed to be new functions. We use them as the targets for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call graph matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findFunctionsWithoutProfile();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> reportOrPersistProfileStats();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
